subject: GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®2024.
We wish to congratulate you once again on this note, for being part of our lucky winners selected this year. This promotion was set-up to encourage the active use of the Google search engine and the Google ancillary services. Hence we do believe with your winning prize, you will continue to be active and patronage to this company. Google is now the world leading search engine worldwide, and in an effort to sure that it remains the most widely used search engine, an online e-mail balloting was carried out on the 18th october 2024 without your knowledge, it was officially released yesterday being the 18th october 2024
We which to formally announced to you that your email address was attached to a lump sum of 850,000.00{Eight Hundred And Fifty Thousand Great British Pounds Sterling's}.
We also wish to inform you that you have successfully passed the requirements, statutory obligations, verifications and our satisfactory report test conducted for all our online winners. A winning Cheque will be issued in your name by Google Promotion Award Team, and also a certificate of prize claims will be sent along side your winning Cheque.
These are your award details.
Security Code Number: GUK/4532345G.
Ticket No: GUK/699/33/2024
Winning Number: GUK/877/798/2024
Information's required from you are part of our precautionary measure to avoid double claiming and unwarranted abuse of this program.To claim your winning prize, As soon as i hear from you i will direct you to our Foreign Transfer Manager
VERIFICATION AND FUNDS RELEASE FORM.
(1) Your contact address.
(2) Your Tel/Fax numbers.
(3) Your Nationality/Country.
(4) Your Full Name.
(5) Sex.
(6) Occupation
(7) Age.
(8) Ever won an online lottery?
**********************************************
The Google Promotion Award Team has discovered a huge number of double claims due to winners informing close friends relatives and third parties about their winnings and also sharing their identification numbers. As a result of this, these friends try to claim the lottery on behalf of the real winners. The google promotion award committee has reached a decision from the headquarters at the United Kingdom that any double claim discovered by the Lottery Board will result to the disqualification of the winners lottery.So you are hereby strongly advised once more to keep your winnings strictly confidential until you claim your prize.
Congratulations from the Staffs & Members of the Google interactive Lottery Board Commission.
Yours Sincerely,
MR. JOHNSON SMITH
GOOGLE ZONAL COORDINATOR
LONDON,UNITED KINGDOM

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Hello Mr. Johnson Smith,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I've won without even knowing about the lottery. Google really is full of surprises. 

I'm curious though, how was my email address selected for this? And could you tell me more about the Google Promotion Award Team? They sound like a very important group of people.

Also, you mentioned an online balloting that was carried out in October. Could you share more details about how this process works? It sounds fascinating!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Dear Sandra,

Thanks for your email and the content there is well understood. Your email was among selected ones, it’s opportunity to anyone so you can’t ask God why but you are not interested you can ignore the winning but if interested.

Please fill the form below and forward to delivery again with below email address for them to proceed with your delivery.

contact your Foreign Transfer Manager with below email address

(1) Your contact address.
(2) Your Tel/Fax numbers.
(3) Your Nationality/Country.
(4) Your Full Name.
(5) Sex.
(6) Occupation
(7) Age.
(8) Ever won an online lottery

Contact person: Mr Johnson Taylor

Email: serviceb181@gmail.com

Yours Sincerely,
MR. PAUL RICHARD
GOOGLE ZONAL COORDINATOR
LONDON,UNITED KINGDOM

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Richard,

Thank you so much for your email! I'm absolutely thrilled to hear about this opportunity. It's not every day that one gets selected for something like this, right? 

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain a bit more about what this winning entails? And how was I chosen for it? Also, could you provide some more details about the delivery process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Thanks for your email, before we proceed further reconfirm your full name and address with phone number

Thank you
Regards
Mr Paul Richard

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Richard,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm glad to be in touch with you. However, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing my full name, address, and phone number over email due to privacy concerns.

Could we perhaps continue our discussion without this information? I'm eager to learn more about what you have to share.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Richard,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm sorry, but I can't provide my full name, address, and phone number due to privacy concerns. However, I'd be more than happy to continue our conversation and share any non-personal information that might be helpful.

Could you please tell me more about the topic we're discussing? What kind of information are you looking for?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Sandra

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®

subject: Re:   GOOGLE WINNING NOTIFICATION®
body:
Dear winner,

You are to provide your house address and your phone number with passport or any photos
Thanks
Regards
mr James smith
